```{r}
library(data.table)

library(colorspace)

devtools::load_all()
```

## Focal strategy data

Load generation strategy data.

```{r}
files = list.files(
  "data/results/morph_data", 
  pattern = "csv",
  full.names = TRUE
)

data_all = lapply(files, fread)
data_all = rbindlist(data_all)

df_strat = data_all[(local == 1) & (infect_percent == T)]
df_strat = df_strat[(cost == 0.05) & (regen == 50)]

df_strat = df_strat[social_strat == "non-handler tracking", 
  social_strat := NA
]
df_strat[, gen_bin := floor(gen / 10) * 10]

# popsize
popsize = 500

# handle for 5 replicates, and 5 obs over 10 gens (observation twice per gen)
data_si_evo = df_strat[, list(
  prop = sum(N) / (popsize * max(repl) * 5)
), by = c("social_strat", "cost", "regen", "gen_bin")]

gen_time = 100

# plot regen as rate per generation timesteps
data_si_evo[, regen_r := gen_time / regen]
```

## Plot evolutionary change in default scenario

```{r}
fig_1a = 
ggplot(data_si_evo)+
  geom_col(
    aes(
      gen_bin, prop, 
      fill = social_strat
    ),
    width = 10
  )+
  geom_vline(
    xintercept = 250,
    lty = 2,
    size = 0.3
    # col = c("grey", "black", "grey")
  )+
  scale_fill_discrete_sequential(
    palette = "Viridis", 
    rev = F,
    l1 = 30,
    name = NULL,
    limits = c("agent avoiding", "agent tracking", "handler tracking"),
    labels = stringr::str_to_sentence,
    na.value = "lightgrey"
  )+
  scale_x_continuous(
    # trans = ggallin::pseudolog10_trans,
    breaks = c(1, 250, 500),
    name = "Generations",
    sec.axis = dup_axis(
      breaks = 250,
      labels = "Pathogen introduction",
      name = NULL
    )
  )+
  scale_y_continuous(
    breaks = c(0, 0.5, 1),
    labels = scales::percent,
    name = "% Individuals"
  )+
  coord_cartesian(
    expand = F,
    ylim = c(0, 1),
    xlim = c(1, 500)
  )+
  theme_test(
    base_size = 11, 
    base_family = "Arial"
  )+
  theme(
    legend.position = "top", 
    legend.key.height = unit(1, "mm"),
    strip.placement = "outside",
    strip.text = ggtext::element_markdown(),
    axis.text.x = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = 8),
    axis.text.y = element_text(
      angle = 90, hjust = 0.5
    )
  )
```

Load generation data.

```{r}
# list files, read, and filter for default model options
files = list.files(
  "data/results/gen_data", 
  pattern = "csv",
  full.names = TRUE
)

data_all = lapply(files, fread)
data_all = rbindlist(data_all)

data = data_all[(cost >= 0.1) & (local == 1)]
```

```{r}
# load data
data = data[regen == 50 & cost == 0.25]

# summarise etc
data[, gen_round := plyr::round_any(gen, 10)]

# spillover gen
sgen = 1200

# add col for representation
data[, gen_abs := gen - sgen]
```

## Intake and energy

```{r}
data = data[, c("gen_abs", "intake.mean", 
                       "energy.mean", "moved.mean", "assoc.mean")]
data = melt(
  data,
  id.vars = "gen_abs"
)
```

## Movement

```{r}
# plot_movement =
ggplot(data[variable %in% c("moved.mean")])+
  geom_bin2d(
    aes(
      gen_abs, value,
    ),
    binwidth = c(0.2, 1),
    show.legend = F,
    alpha = 0.8
  )+
  geom_hline(
    yintercept = 0,
    lty = 3
  )+
  geom_vline(
    data = data.table(
      x = 0, # 0.667 * 5000,
      scenario = 3
    ),
    aes(
      xintercept = x
    ),
    lty = 3
  )+
  stat_summary(
    fun = mean,
    fun.min = ci_lower,
    fun.max = ci_upper,
    aes(
      gen_abs, value,
    ),
    colour = "grey20",
    geom = "line",
    alpha = 0.8
  )+
  stat_summary(
    data = data[variable %in% c("moved.mean") & 
           between(gen_abs, -25, 25)],
    fun = mean,
    fun.min = ci_lower,
    fun.max = ci_upper,
    aes(
      gen_abs, value,
      shape = variable
    ),
    colour = "grey20",
    fill = "grey99",
    shape = 21
  )+
  scale_fill_continuous_sequential(
    palette = "Mako",
    trans = "sqrt"
  )+
  scale_x_continuous(
    trans = ggallin::pseudolog10_trans,
    breaks = c(-3000, -100, -5, 5, 100, 1500),
    labels = scales::comma_format(
      accuracy = 1
    ),
    name = "Gens. since spillover",
    sec.axis = sec_axis(
      trans = function(x) x + 3334,
      breaks = c(0, 3000, 3334, 5000),
      labels = scales::comma_format(
        accuracy = 1
      ),
      name = "Generations"
    )
  )+
  theme_test(base_family = "Arial")+
  theme(
    # legend.position = c(0.2, 0.15),
    legend.key = element_blank(),
    legend.background = element_blank(),
    strip.background = element_blank(),
    strip.text = element_text(
      face = "italic"
    )
  )+
  coord_cartesian(
    ylim = c(30, 90)
  )+
  labs(
    x = NULL,
    y = "Distance moved",
    colour = NULL,
    shape = NULL
  )
```

```{r}
) &

    plot.tag = element_text(
```
